read:
(:action read_instructions
  :parameters (?p - player ?i - instructions)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?i) (attribute ?i knowledge unread))
  :effect (and (attribute ?i knowledge read))
)
wash:
(:action wash_gore_tex
  :parameters (?p - player ?cl - clothing ?i - instructions)
  :precondition (and (attribute ?cl type gore_tex) (attribute ?cl cleanness dirty) (attribute ?i knowledge read))
  :effect (and (attribute ?cl cleanness clean))
)

(:action wash_polar_fleece
  :parameters (?p - player ?cl - clothing ?wm - washing_machine)
  :precondition (and (attribute ?cl type polar_fleece) (attribute ?cl cleanness dirty) (attribute ?wm fullness empty) (attribute ?wm electric conductivity off))
  :effect (and (attribute ?cl cleanness clean) (attribute ?wm fullness full with polar fleece) (attribute ?wm electric conductivity on))
)
```

These actions capture the steps and descriptions provided for cleaning synthetic hiking gear, ensuring that each action has appropriate preconditions and effects based on the entity states.
handle:
(:action handle_synthetic_boots
  :parameters (?p - player ?b - boots)
  :precondition (and (attribute ?b type synthetic) (attribute ?b condition intact))
  :effect (and (attribute ?b condition maintained))
)
clean:
(:action clean_down_jackets
  :parameters (?p - player ?j - jacket ?i - instructions)
  :precondition (and (attribute ?j type down) (attribute ?j cleanness dirty) (attribute ?i knowledge read))
  :effect (and (attribute ?j cleanness clean))
)
